alert.note: Alert for Baker; Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 11:42AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Baker, northern Columbia and eastern Hamilton Counties through 1230 PM EST... At 1141 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Belmont, or 9 miles north of White Springs, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... White Springs and Belmont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia
